articles.author: JOSEPH PISANI, AP Retail Writer
articles.title: Amazon testing delivery by self-driving robots in Snohomish County - KOMO News
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon is bringing delivery robots to the streets of Snohomish County. The Seattle-based online shopping giant says it started to test the self-driving robots Wednesday that can bring Amazon packages to shoppers' doorsteps. The robots ar…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon is bringing delivery robots to the streets of Snohomish County. The Seattle-based online shopping giant says it started to test the self-driving robots Wednesday that can bring Amazon packages to shoppers' doorsteps. The robots are ligh… [+543 chars]

No man ever reached to excellence in any one art or profession without having passed through the slow and painful process of study and preparation.
By going beyond your own problems and taking care …confidence, courage, and a greater sense of calm.
Take it easy — but take it.
No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
Though no one can go back and make a brand new sta… can start from now and make a brand new ending.
The moment one gives close attention to anything, even a blade of grass, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
Who we are never changes. Who we think we are does.
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
Once you choose hope, anythings possible.
The only thing to do with good advice is to pass it on. It is never of any use to oneself.
Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
